group_1.textLeft: No way... Hotaru...?@Hotaru got up by herself.

group_1.textRight: Nope, this isn't a dream.

group_1.textLeft: What should I do...?@I only have the smoothies I normally make.

group_1.textRight: It's alright. I can make something myself.
...D'you think we'll see pigs fly today?

group_1.textLeft: I hope we don't see anything crazier than pigs...

group_1.textRight: ...Ahaha.

group_1.textCenter: This will be on the test, so be sure to review it.
And sorry for this, but could someone help me@carry out my teaching materials?

group_1.textLeft: Here, Teacher. I'll help you.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800900:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?! Hotaru...?

group_1.textLeft: Don't want me to?

group_1.textRight: Uh, no... That's not what I...
Are you feeling well?
Like...have you hit your head recently?

group_1.textLeft: I'm fine.

group_1.textRight: I-is that so...@Well, I guess I'll ask you to help me then.

group_1.textLeft: 'Kay.
Did something happen to Hotaru...?@She's been up this whole time, hasn't she?

group_1.textRight: Maybe she can't sleep 'cause she's slept too much?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone's freakin' out.

group_1.textRight: She's never been like this before...@Even I'm getting a little scared...

group_1.textLeft: This whole stint with Akari must've put the hurt@on her...
I've been...abandoned by Akari...?

group_1.textRight: No...it's not that bad.@...At least, I don't think so...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...from an elementary schooler's point of view,@high schoolers gotta look like adults to them, right?
And Akariー@She's always pushing herself to look taller,
so she's probably wanting high schoolers to act like@high schoolers, I'm betting...

group_1.textRight: Ahー@Akari is like that, isn't she?
I don't even get why, though...

group_1.textLeft: For that matter,@I guess Hotaru's a bit too lazy for her, huh...?

group_1.textRight: You're right... It's like she's had her ideal image@of high school students shatter before her?

group_1.textLeft: ...What do I do? I know that I'm too lazy...
...What do I do?

group_1.textRight: What do you mean "what do I do?"...@If you're aware, then fix yourself...

group_1.textLeft: You mean stop being a slacker...?@Me...?

group_1.textRight: Who else could we be talking about?@[chara:800201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800201:cheek_0][chara:800201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:800201:lipSynch_1]If you can show her you can do well,
I bet Akari will change her tune about you.

group_1.textLeft: You're right...@I'll work a bit harder, just watch...
...Hey, what happened to Hotaru...?
You think she's one of those kids@who gets things done when she tries?

group_1.textRight: Actually, you're right about that.@Hotaru can do anything if she gets into gear.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! For real?

group_1.textRight: Yep, I don't think Hotaru herself knows that though...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, welcome back!
Nice job helping out. Let's have lunch.
Speaking of, did you bring your bento?@Akari's the one who always...

group_1.textRight: All good. I packed it myself.
If I didn't do it properly, then...you know...

group_1.textLeft: ...You're serious.
